name: Laura Devendorf
content: Laura Devendorf Skip to content Wear is a project that chronicles a year spent making, measuring, and marking experiences as a mother during COVID lockdown. It is a Design Memoir in the form of a handmade woven garment with integrated circuitry that measures the forces on my body.
